attributes.action: Vote on three options for Brexit :Leave on WTO rules: Stay in EU: EU agreed deal
attributes.additional_details: We have to have a democratic resolution to the current Brexit Impasse and it is up to the elected representatives to provide this, the people have already spoken. The above petition gives them the opportunity to vote for their own or their parties or their constituencies preferred option. If they are torn between options then they can vote for more than one option. Crucially all Members of Parliament have to accept the democratic majority decision.
attributes.background: All MPs vote for one or more options. The option with the most votes (not necessarily a majority of Parliament) is the way forward chosen Democratically by our representatives. This is then implemented by the Party in power with NO opposition from dissenters in the rest of Parliament.
